template:
<iframe ng-src="{{config.serverpath + '?gm_zoomlevel=' + config.gm_zoomlevel
									+ '&gm_latitude=' + config.gm_latitude
									+ '&gm_longitude=' + config.gm_longitude
									+ '&gm_travel=' + config.gm_travel
									+ '&gm_origin=' + config.gm_origin
									+ '&gm_destination=' + config.gm_destination
									+ '&gm_apikey=' + config.gm_apikey}}" style="height:{{config.height}}px; width:100%; display:block; border:0px;"></iframe>

settings.label: Server Path
settings.description: Change this value to use the correct path

settings.label: Google zoomlevel
settings.description: Enter the required zoomlevel for googlemaps

settings.label: Latitude
settings.description: Enter the latitude for your GPS coordinates

settings.label: Longitude
settings.description: Enter the longitude for your GPS coordinates
Show travel time between two locations?
settings.label: Travel
Origin
settings.description: Start location for travel time calculation

name: Google Maps with traffic
author: Bastiaan van Haastrecht
description: Google Maps with auto refreshing traffic layer. NEW, added travel time calculation. https://github.com/BasvanH/
